body: WTF, not only do monkeys have way smaller penises than homo sapiens' average counterparts (except dudes with micropenises), but they don't have that 'bulge' like dogs do... and if they were the testicles, they couldn't fit inside a vagina, not even in fiction... oh wait, in hentai anything is possible (even defying any kind of logic) haha allllllllright.... enjoy...
